scripts.check-engines: node -e "const {engines} = require('./package'); const [major, minor] = process.versions.node.split('.').map(Number); const [reqMajor, reqMinor] = engines.node.replace('>=', '').split('.').map(Number); if(major < reqMajor || (major === reqMajor && minor < reqMinor)) throw new Error('Node version is too low! Required: ' + engines.node);"
